original_text: Paul continued to speak for some time. He said, ‘People need to do what is right. They need to stop themselves doing wrong things. One day, God will judge people for how they have lived.’
korean_text: 바울이 의와 절제와 장차 오는 심판을 강론하니 벨릭스가 두려워하여 대답하되 지금은 가라 내가 틈이 있으면 너를 부르리라 하고

sentences.original_text: Paul continued to speak for some time.
People need to do what is right.
They need to stop themselves doing wrong things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신이 잘못된 일을 하는 것을 멈춰야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: God will judge people for how they have lived.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 사람들이 어떻게 살았는지에 대해 심판하실 것입니다.
